love-on-a-leash.title: Love on a Leash
love-on-a-leash.desc: As a volunteer opportunity, I created a video for Love on Leash, a nonprofit organization that provides therapy dogs for local groups.

a-midlife-crisis-but-in-college.alt: A Midlife Crisis But in College Logo
a-midlife-crisis-but-in-college.title: A Midlife Crisis, But in College
a-midlife-crisis-but-in-college.desc: This video was created for the Design Salon 2020, a competition hosted by the UW Libraries that asked participants to submit and share their digital works.

videos-for-uw-madison-memes-for-milk-chu.alt: Videos For UW-Madison Memes For Milk Chugging Teens Logo
videos-for-uw-madison-memes-for-milk-chu.title: Videos For UW-Madison Memes For Milk Chugging Teens
videos-for-uw-madison-memes-for-milk-chu.desc: For three years within my college career, I helped run the UW-Madison Facebook meme page called UW-Madison Memes for Milk Chugging teens.

advertisement-club-videos.title: Advertisement Club Videos
advertisement-club-videos.desc: I created promo videos for local Madison, WI organizations and businesses such as Forward Madison FC, CAMPO, and Porter Coffee House.

black-sheep-videos.title: Black Sheep Videos
black-sheep-videos.desc: I interned with the Black Sheep at UW-Madison throughout my second year (2018-2019 to create memes weekly relating to the university and recent events for their Instagram and Twitter accounts.

communication-arts-200-video.title: CA 200 Video: A Required Meal Plan
communication-arts-200-video.desc: Within CA 200: Introduction to Digital Communication, I made a video focusing on the required meal plan that new incoming UW student were required to participate in, and why I thought it was a bad idea.

communication-arts-155-video.title: CA 155 Video: Eddie McDanger
communication-arts-155-video.desc: Within CA 155: Introduction to Digital Media Production, I alongside another 2 students created a comical video that was a parody to survival shows that involved me, â€œEddie McDanger climbing up the iconic campus hill, Bascom Hill.
